passive.name: TAILWIND
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) TAILWIND
                                Passively gains 5% Movement Speed. Nearby allied champions also gain this bonus.

q.name: (Q) HOWLING GALE
q.description:
(Q) HOWLING GALE
 1s   50 
                                
                                
                                Charges up for 0.75 seconds and summons a powerful whirlwind that deals 50 magic damage (50/90/130/170 + 50%  ) and knocks up enemies in its path. The whirlwind always reaches its destination in 0.5 seconds.This ability's charges are stored once every 14 seconds, up to a maximum of 2 charges.

w.name: (W) ZEPHYR
w.description:
(W) ZEPHYR
 9/8/7/6s   50/55/60/65 
                                
                                
                                Gains 10/25/20/25% Movement Speed for 2 seconds. The wind spirit automatically searches for the nearest 3 campions within range, granting Movement Speed bonuses to allies and dealing 50 magic damage (50/90/130/170 + 50%  + 20% bonus  ) to enemies.
notes: range, granting Movement Speed bonuses to allies and dealing 50 magic damage (50/90/130/170 + 50%  + 20% bonus  ) to enemies

e.name: (E) EYE OF THE STORM
e.description:
(E) EYE OF THE STORM
 16/14/12/10s   70/80/90/100 
                                
                                
                                Blesses herself and the allied champion with the lowers Health with a shield that absorbs 65 damage (65/90/115/140 + 45% ) and grants 10 Attack Damage (10/20/30/40 + 10% ) while it holds. Lasts for 3 seconds.If there is a turret within range, applies a shield to the turret as well.
notes: range, applies a shield to the turret as well

r.name: (R) MONSOON
r.description:
(R) MONSOON
 80/75/70s   100 
                                
                                
                                Calls forth mighty winds of salvation to knock back surrounding enemies and restore 50 Health (50/100/150 + 30% ) to nearby allies each second for 3 seconds.
